entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump I have seen even good, loving Americans turn on one another since 2016. Its Almost like the hate brought on the plague of coronavirus. How long will the strife go on?GOD has had patience on those who turned to hate and do not realize that His eyes BEHOLD wickedness for a time.
